website_summaries.verdict: An affordable comforter set with a minimalist design perfect for any bedroom decor.
pros: Included pillow sham has extra padding
Quality square stitching pattern keeps filling in place
Sits at a low price point
Simple design fits in well with most decor
cons: Some found the fabric to be too thin

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought the brick wall style pattern was original. Like most would we washed it before use, following the tags Exactly. Even dried on low the inside of the pillow cases completely melted and stuck together. They’re literally lined with plastic that almost looks and feels like tissue paper, and even the lowest setting on the dryer destroyed it. Both pillow cases are welded together all crinkled up and are stiff and crunchy. Complete garbage. On top of it all, the “gray” has an awful green tint to it. I tried to return it and apparently the seller has to grant permission...we’ll see what happens!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Waste of your money.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this comforter for one day and it's already coming apart at the seams. It's extremely comfortable and warm, but that's pointless if it can't last a day without it coming unsowed. So in light of that and for what I paid for this I'm only giving one star. If I wanted a cheap comforter I would have went to Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Obadiah

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, causing you to itch when on top.
customer_reviews.text: I saw that some people were saying that the stitching was falling apart quickly, but was hoping that was a fluke. Well, it’s not. As soon as I opened it, you could see the pieces coming apart. Currently using it until new one arrives as my previous one is too small for my bed, and also, this “full/queen” is closer to a full so it is a little short on actual Queens. I do not recommend and this is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: PHD

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. It’s thick, soft, and I know it’ll help keep me warmer at night! Feels of good quality, packaged great, arrived right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My dream adult blanky lol
customer_reviews.text: I love my new blanket . I bought this thinking it was a cover for the actual blanket and ended up with the blanket but I don't care I'm keeping it . I love the softness and feel of it and it's fluffy to . This blanket is so comfortable even in the summer I lay on it .I would def. Recommend and you can't beat the price either way better than target or any store price . Also there were no seams coming off everything is was sown tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Initially loved it soft, and simple comforter. Opened it up in January 4 months later, loose threads all over and piping around the edges unraveling to reveal a interior white rope. I use this as a top blanket and have not washed it, yet it is falling apart! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: No problems here! 5 months strong and still warm!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for maybe 5 months now... And I completely forgot to write a review till now haha. Up to now this product has been amazing! It keeps my husband and 2 dogs VERY warm during these cold nights. (I reside in Riverside CA) I have no had any problems with the stitching or the plush within, probably because I take my bedding to a local laundry mat because they have those industrial sized washers and dryers. I just go on my days off and wash them when needed. And I LOVE how fluffy the squars get after they come out of the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Have a queen size bed, ordered a king since I like it to be bigger. Came quickly, super soft, and love the color! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Wright

customer_reviews.title: For my son’s dorm
customer_reviews.text: So I’m just going to go ahead and give this 5 stars. I don’t know how many of you have strange kids who refuse to get under their covers. I have one of those weirdos. I bought him the most comfortable sheets you could imagine, but he says they feel weird, so he prefers to lay on top of the comforter. I honestly don’t think he will ever find a woman if he refuses to get under the covers, but that’s his choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and warm
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this very small set to match the guest bedroom with our red sheets. Though the color is slightly off, it is WAY better than what we originally had for it. I am very surprised by the quality, how it is so lightweight but is extremely comfortable and insulated very well. It is also very beautiful with the square pattern that was sewn. Overall, very satisfied. I would have bought this for my bedroom if it had the entire set of 8 piece.
customer_reviews.author: Lue Xiong

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL IN EVERY WAY FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: Best alternative down comforter I have ever purchased. Very soft and light, yet warm. The material stays smooth. Also, I don't exactly know why, but the bed is so very easy to make. No walking back and forth adjusting it, just one go around for each side. I love that maybe most of all. The shams stay nice and smooth. Seems to resist dirt, and washes nicely when necessary. Love it. I would get another in a different color just for the enjoyment of changing it out sometimes, but I don't really have room to store it. I would recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best comforter I've ever owned. Bye Bye Target!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this blanket! Shipped pretty quickly! I was VERY worried when I saw the box was so small. I was like, "THIS BETTER BE QUEEN COMFORTER!" But I opened to find out they had compressed it in a plastic bag and sucked out all air. Very clever. So I ripped it out and boom! A fluffy, beautiful, and comfortable comforter! I adore this very much. Wrinkles will go away in one day. But after one night sleeping with this, I'm extremely satisfied. I look forward to Winter so I can test this! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jake Larrs Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good value per dollar. Love the shams! Attracts pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: Good deep color. Soft and seems durable enough for polyester. Seems like a good value. I bought a “nicer” bedding set which came with much cheaper made shams. The shams are very nice. Do you sleep with a pet? The only reason that this doesn’t have 5stars is because pet hair LOVES this fabric’s weave. It is very hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Soft n cozy.
customer_reviews.text: It's very soft and cozy. And not at all heavy feeling. I ordered the black in a queen size for my full size bed because I wanted it to drape over. And it worked out perfectly. My grandmother came to visit, and slept on it the majority of time ,and she would repedtly say how my bed was so cozy. But because of how light it's and the material and fill, I would wash this by itself on a gentle cycle.
customer_reviews.author: @IG julesisresilient

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: It's in no way a down alternative. It is exactly what you would think of getting when you open a bed bundle bag for a dorm room set or kids room. That's done with us since we have cats and wash it often. It's soft and not beeding up on us. We got a black one and so far it hasn't faded with washing either. Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tchelle

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets. Bought them for my son but the sheet ended up being too small so the band broke the day he got it but I have the same sheet and the bands stayed on for over a year. Great quality otherwise. Next time I'm going to buy a bigger size for my son's bed. But I love the feel of the material and I'm super picky with my linen.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This comforter was really comfortable and soft but unfortunately it started coming apart so im returning it. Also it seemed to collect a lot of lint (I got the black color) and it looked really unflattering. What upsets me is how impossible it is to package this thing and send it back because it doesn’t fit in the bag that it came with. Ive been sitting here for hours trying to figure out how to repackage this and im losing my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Somehow burns in washer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, loved it, spilt some food on it because it be like that sometimes. I decided to wash it and my washers supes old and only has a cold setting and somehow four of the little square sections got burned and all the stuffing spilled out. I can't even fix it because the tears are so large and the fabric is so freaking thin. Was mad comfy though
customer_reviews.author: indigo simms

customer_reviews.title: Great but does not match picture.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the product. However does not match what's shown in the picture. Stitching is definitely different. Had a slight odor after opening, but washed right out. I've had this over a year and still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Let me begin by saying this product it way better than any bed in a bag I've EVER bought. The pillow case is so soft and it has padding! I've never seen a pillowcase with padding. I was amazed! The comforter, is so full and soft, it's thick and looks like you spent a lot of money on it. The only thing I regret, is not buying this sooner!!! My kid loves it! It's easy to make your bed with.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Warm...not hot
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sweating with this comforter, and the shams are a great little extra! I got this to top off a light blanket for the winter, but hope to still use it during the summer months. It's light and soft, but the combination of the materials and the color attracts a lot of lint from the room.
customer_reviews.author: tr

customer_reviews.title: Do not wash it
customer_reviews.text: I first time I was ready to use, I washed it (according to instructions). It lost all shape and had its filling come out so we had to brush and eventually use the lint roller. It is described as down alternative, but polyfill is what was coming out of it in lumps and clumps. Waste of money and not as it is described.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, great price
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a bit skeptical with this comforter being so much cheaper than many of the other options but I went for it since the reviews seemed pretty good and I'm glad I made the plunge! It is so comfortable it might even make it harder to get out of bed and the pillowcases are great too and are padded like the comforter which is also quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: One problem: Comforter is sort of short
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this set, it feels incredible- I used to not care about thread count- thought it was bs marketing, but then I got this on a whim and now it feels like I sleep on clouds every night. Only issue is the comforter is like a square or something, and it’s just a bit too short.
customer_reviews.author: King Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this because how low priced it was. But thank God once in a while something wonderful comes along that you can afford. This thing is by far the best comforter I have ever bought in my life and I’m not exaggerating it is so soft lightweight I live in Florida I don’t need anything heavy. I absolutely love it I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA

customer_reviews.title: Woot woot here comes the comfort train!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter. I was worried that while the color was what I wanted, the quality of the bedding and pillow covers would not be on par as with many other comforters on Amazon. However, I have been having a very comfortable week with this new set and recommend it to all the others out there that were in my shoes. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: CDizzie

customer_reviews.title: Comforter is the problem.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up replacing the comforter after a month or so. Not only was it difficult to wash, but if you get any dog hair on it, or anything. It won’t come out without a fight.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: nice but thin and not as vibrant a blue as the pic
customer_reviews.text: the color is lighter than it looks in the picture..I was looking forward to that beautiful vibrant light ocean blue but instead its just plain light blue..not nearly as vibrant as the pic and it is very thin
customer_reviews.author: Confused buyer

customer_reviews.title: Don't be scared
customer_reviews.text: Don't be scared off by bad reviews. This is all you need. I took the 2nd blanket off the bed because it is plenty warm enough on its own and am about to order a second one in khaki for a different look. It is so light and soft. Very comforting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Got to buy a couple more!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and softness of this comforter. It is so warm and cozy too. Go glad that I got a King size comforter, eventhough I have a Queen sized bed. The comforter hangs down nicely on each side of my bed past the skirt, which looks very nice. The Queen size won't do this. Best comforter I've ever purchased for sure!😊
customer_reviews.author: Robertson

customer_reviews.title: It’s comfortable, but the black one makes fuzzies stand out too much!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I would recommend that y’all don’t buy the black one though. I bought the black one and it catches on to a lot of dust and fuzzies! My room has carpet so that could be another reason for so much dust but I have to use a lint roller every day to clean it. I’d recommend buying white or a lighter color. It’s definitely amazing and of good quality. I would just change the color if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first but could be more durable.
customer_reviews.text: I got the grey one and it's ok. It looks nice on my bed especially when I first got it but I've had it about 6 months now and have washed it several times. The quality leaves a bit to be desired. The pillow shams are kind of coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was my third or fourth time buying from kinglinen. I bought comforter set for me and another for my son. Great quality. Just what i wanted. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: ... I was skeptical at first being that this was pretty cheap for a down comforter
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was skeptical at first being that this was pretty cheap for a down comforter. It came and it really is high quality and very very soft. I go through comforters quite frequently because I have two dogs that sleep with me at night and often their nails rip the comforters. this comforter is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Italiana224

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, good value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Value-priced set is good quality (fabric is very soft). Giving it four stars instead of five as I'm not sure how durable it will be over the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: ainadude

customer_reviews.title: We love this comforter!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this comforter. We love the fabric, as it doesn't snag on your skin (both hubby and I are really particular about this). It's comfy, cuddly, not too heavy, and perfect for year-round. I've already washed it twice and the color and filling have held up just fine. Still looks like it's brand new!
customer_reviews.author: bri047

customer_reviews.title: Serves my purposes well...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a Home and Gardens type of guy so I bought this thing because the size seemed right and the price was okay. I've been really happy. Given some the other reviews you'd think this thing was made of paper. Not true. Sure, it could be bit thicker but it is holding up well for me. Will I still be sleeping under it in 20 years? Probably not but then again, I didn't pay a million bucks. It's pretty. It's affordable. It's soft.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this purchase. I ordered the Paloma Grey and it's a lovely neutral color. I ordered the king size for my queen bed because of all the reviews. Very good advice. The king fits beautifully. As other reviews stated, the comforter came squished into a tight box, but immediately filled with air as I took it out of the box. Most of the wrinkles disappeared in a couple of days. And, it's very comfortable and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a cheap comforter for the guest bedroom . Loved it so much that we ended up buying one for our bed as well. Not sure what the cheap reviews are about but we’ve washed this at least 7 or 8 times and never had a problem. Unfortunately my dog got ahold of it, so we’re ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Carigan

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate picture
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt have border which was the only reason i purchased it other than that its a fine blanket but the clean cut border was literally the only reason i spent an extra 10$ on this
customer_reviews.author: 🌞 sunshine

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap quality, stuffing comes out constantly making it look super dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Always Review My Orders

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on bedding
customer_reviews.text: I got mine today. I ordered cream colored sheets on prime and this comforter set. It is so comfy I feel like I am laying in a cloud. For the money you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter more every day. When I first got it, I thought, "Well, you get what you pay for." I am not sure what changed my mind, but this comforter fluffed up, is super soft, and makes the bed look great. At the price, you really can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Reader101

customer_reviews.title: very nice for cold temperatures but unusable during warmer nights
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off my mentioning that I live in Southern California, so the weather is almost always pleasant. This comforter is very plush and kept me comfortably warm during the winter. However, during the rest of the time it became unusable as it just kept me too hot when the temperature was over 70 degrees. The material is very good at retaining heat so it's great for sub 70 degrees, but not so much in temps over that. I put it in storage and will definitely use it when the temps cool down, but for now i've reverted to using an old blanket i had and am currently looking for a comforter with lighter/liter(?) material for any time use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome awesome bang for your buck. Soft Warm and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: What a great blanket I will start with that. There are many pros for this blanket. I am very happy with my purchase Moving onto a quick recap I use this in a home during winter (my area averages 40-50 degrees) with a bed sheet. I am very comfortably warm. Pros : Great color affordable soft the shams are nice Cons: not the best packaging pretty much one use. Overall I love this blanket and its a great size. good for sharing or using alone.
customer_reviews.author: William Sung

customer_reviews.title: Footprint on my comfortor!
customer_reviews.text: This has more to do with Amazon than the actual comfortor. That seems fine, not that I would know because I couldn't use it right away since it looks like someone had stepped on it with a very muddy shoe! The comfortor itself seems nice but seriously if something comes in a plastic sealed bag how does it have a footprint on it.
customer_reviews.author: MARK

customer_reviews.title: ... our washer about five times now because it my stupid puppy and it still looks and feels like new
customer_reviews.text: I have had to wash this in our washer about five times now because it my stupid puppy and it still looks and feels like new. I even put it in the dryer on a low heat and it comes out looking like I just took it out of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Adriene B

customer_reviews.title: A little  small
customer_reviews.text: It's not big enough for a true Queen bed but its very light.. I wouldnt use if you're dealing with low 40 degree weather
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: I like it but the pic is off
customer_reviews.text: The color is as shown and matches the rest of my furnishings. The pic does not show a king size comforter on a king size bed. I have mine on a queen size bed and it doesn't hang over that far. I it is very soft, light and fluffy.. it washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Wells

customer_reviews.title: I really like it, it just doesn't have enough stuffing in ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, it just doesn't have enough stuffing in some of the sections so it's hard to fluff out and not look lumpy. Overall, it's nice, warm, cozy, and a good price. I would like to purchase a couple more at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lambooy

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat pleased
customer_reviews.text: I had to use a little roller to get a lot of the alternative filling off the outside of the comforter. I wasn't too disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Washington

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket! It is super soft, nice and big and it keeps us warm through the night. I will definitely buy more in different colors. I'm not sure if it will be too hot in the summer but we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne W.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality! Don't waste your $
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect until I washed it. It fell apart at the seams!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly S. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Disappointing and cheap. Using it for the trunk of my car
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good gift.
customer_reviews.text: Just what my granddaughter wanted for her black loft bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: This is very soft & comfortable. The last comforter I bought didn't fit over ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very soft & comfortable. The last comforter I bought didn't fit over the queen bed very well (too short) but this one is great in length and coverage too! Definitely pull the trigger on this -- for the price you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn C

customer_reviews.title: A bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I’m placing a five star because this is the warmest blanket I have ever owned. when I received my package it was tightly packed with a little surprise in it. It was a dead roach, but nothing that the washer machine couldn’t fix. First time in 7 years my husband and I shared the same blanket until we woke up in the morning. Despite the dead roach, still is such a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Plain basic set. Soft light weight and comfortable. Used this for the spare bunk in my sons room.
customer_reviews.author: Ali B

customer_reviews.title: True black comforter
customer_reviews.text: Actually black and comfortable. Washed it a few times and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight for the guest room!
customer_reviews.text: It fits in well with the decor in the guest room. Perfect for year round use!
customer_reviews.author: Meemaw59

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough
customer_reviews.text: Did not seem to be XL. It did not cover the ends of the the bed.
customer_reviews.author: HHE

customer_reviews.title: confortable
customer_reviews.text: My daugther love it, because is's very warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jema55

customer_reviews.title: it was exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: excellent product for the price, but i should have opened it sooner as it was missing the pillow sham. it was my fault for leaving it so long before i opened it up. it is a very soft and comfortable product. i love the weight and feel of it. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: deborah s chambers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very nice - looks great and keeps you perfect temperature
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to go with his black Panther bedroom and paired it with black Panther throws and pillows ******update******ripped where tag is less than 5 months
customer_reviews.author: Kena Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Got this for grandpa as a Christmas gift, he loves this blanket! It's not so thick that it gets you overheated and is thin enough that you don't get lost in it. The material seems to be holding up great after a months use.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Thinnes

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price and it didn't bunch up after washing very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ingram

customer_reviews.title: It is soft to the touch and super warm. I am absolutely in love with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have washed this comforter numerous times because I have two dogs that shed and it hasn't fallen apart or lost its color. It is soft to the touch and super warm. I am absolutely in love with the comforter set!
customer_reviews.author: shannon caesar

customer_reviews.title: Decent as long as you don't have pets
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad comforter, but definitely not good if you have pets that are allowed on your bed. Gave 3 stars because even though its soft and lightweight, EVERYTHING sticks to it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Reviewed
customer_reviews.text: People are saying its bad but ive had mine for 2 years now and its perfectly fine. No rips tears or seams undone! I take very good care of it. Its my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect just as described! My daughter loves her new comforter and doesn't need any other blanket to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is amazing. I got it for my daughter for Xmas and she's been in love with it sence. It's big and fluffy, Not too big for a standard washer tho.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha McDonald

customer_reviews.title: It tore on the first wash.
customer_reviews.text: Its very soft and it looks really nice. I finally washed it (like 2 weeks after I got it) and it tore just a little in one spot. Thats why the 3 stars. The spot isn't too noticeable but I would expect it to be a little more durable than that. Overall a decent comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't attempted to wash it yet, but it is super soft and the pillowcases aren't a thin cheap material either. So far I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Grooms

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have bought stuff like this before and it was not of quality. This is very good quality and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: April M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's BEAUTIFUL and so soft and fluffy! I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RKS

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BUY
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and warm. Very durable stitching. I have had this for 2 years now and it has not faded or lost its shape. Love this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda b Flores

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a comforter in a pinch since I had just moved and this did the trick. Would easily recommend for the price. Similar products I have seen are almost double if not triple the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: My main thinh is that it held up in the wash! Good item
customer_reviews.author: raymond ortega

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, super soft
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit in my washer, who cares. My gf won't leave my house. So this thing did its job. Super comfy, super soft, warm but I still use it in the summer it breaths great. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: willie t roberts

customer_reviews.title: Little Abrasion are Weakness
customer_reviews.text: Every time you move the cotton comes through the material. Do not buy! It leaves white cotton everywhere and it's a pain to clean it up. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Comfy fabric
customer_reviews.text: So delightfully warm. The full/queen fit the queen bed very nicely
customer_reviews.author: L. Ziebarth

customer_reviews.title: Good but damaged after cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: The comforter in itself is pretty good. The problem comes when you wash it. I like to keep clean and wash it every so often and when you do wash it - it causes the inner material to come out and renders it kind of useless.
customer_reviews.author: Pls No Tracking

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality,I should have sized up I have a twin bed I should have got a twin XL but other than that it's fluffy, it's comfortable not itchy or scratchy. great buy! just should have sized up!
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: As the other reviews state, this comforter is very soft and an awesome price. It did have a few thread strands I had to cut off, but otherwise it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite comforters ever
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite comforters ever! It is very thick and Ive washed it multiple times and it hasnt faded or fell apart. If you're looking for a comforter to keep you really warm and toasty this is it. Definitely a winter comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sixx

customer_reviews.title: Good if you if you are cold weather year round.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality was happy with it. Only setback is the comforter is to hot to use. Last comforter I had kept me cool when it was hot and warm when it was cold. Been searching for something similar since.
customer_reviews.author: Les Batson

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: So soft, so comfy, so expensive looking and feeling. Not too hot and not too cold, just right to make your bed cozy.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: This comforter is nice and warm as well as soft
customer_reviews.text: Winter is coming! This comforter is nice and warm as well as soft. We use a deep pocket Queen mattress but ordered the King size comforter and it fits well. Definitely a great substitute to a down comforter if you are allergic like I am.
customer_reviews.author: Emy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: the absolute best. Bought one for me loved it so much bought one for my mom and sister too both of them love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Curtis

customer_reviews.title: the one we got is nice..
customer_reviews.text: This is not the comforter we got when we ordered it! However, the one we got is nice.... I would have liked to receive the one I tried to purchase... the one we got is super thin, kinda stiff...
customer_reviews.author: Christina Goss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Comforter Set
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous for the price. Quality is superior; fabric is silky, yet comforter has a down-filled feel. Shams are generously sized (I used 2 pillows in each to make them plump and attractive). A really good buy!
customer_reviews.author: graybeard's wife

customer_reviews.title: Best comforter ever!!
customer_reviews.text: So soft and absolutely perfect for any queen size mattress!!
customer_reviews.author: bryan v.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bedspread so much! Very soft and fluffy. Gets a little hot during the summer time though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not that great of a product.
customer_reviews.text: If you love to cook/sweat at night, this is the perfect product! I had to buy a bed fan just to sleep without sweating at night!
customer_reviews.author: Yroc

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and warm
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and keeps you warm on very cold nights. Have recently cleaned it in cold water and air fluff dry. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Covering
customer_reviews.text: Got my comforter the other day so happy with how it keep me warm and cool. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: ... was sent from heaven to bless me with the greatest sleep of my life
customer_reviews.text: Whoever came up with this was sent from heaven to bless me with the greatest sleep of my life. It is so soft and fluffy and come with soft and fluffy pillow cases I need no other comforter in my life. Just this.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: It’s holding up nicely. However, if your room is hot you will wake up sweaty. But if your room is cold it will keep you warm that’s for sure. However I wish it came with sheets and not just the comforter and pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: RockStarin

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I searched the internet far and wide looking for a decent comforter. It super lightweight and still stays puffy after a couple trips through the washer and dryer. Overall really pleased with this product. 10 out of 10, I’d definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

  • Size: Twin
  • 100% Hypoallgenic Poly Fiber Fill Down Alternative
  • Machine washable
This set includes: 1 Comforter (64"x88") 1 Sham (20"x26")
feature_bullets: 100% Hypoallgenic Poly Fiber Fill Down Alternative;Comforter set includes 1 comforter, 1 sham
